title: Journey Orchestration Step event  Common Fields
description: This Mixin contains the common Jounney Metadata information.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Orchestration for creating user journey
entrance
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicate if the user has entered the journey. If not present, assuming that the value is false.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: reentrance
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicate if the user has reentered the journey with the same instance. If not present, assuming that the value is false.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: instanceEnded
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicate if the instance is ended (sucessfully or not).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: eventID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Event ID in processing, for the step processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: nodeID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: client node ID.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: stepID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Unique id of the step that is currently in processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: stepName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the step that is currently in processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: stepType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Type of the step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: stepStatus
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Status of the journey step, representing in which shape the step is, when its processing has been done.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: journeyID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: ID of the journey.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: journeyVersionID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: ID of the journey version. This id represents the identity reference to the journey, in case of the journeyStepEvent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: journeyVersionName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the journey version.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: journeyVersion
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Version of the journey version.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: instanceID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Internal ID of the journey instance.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: externalKey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: External key extracted from the event to process it.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: parentStepID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Step ID of the parent of the current processed step in the instance.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: parentStepName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Step name of the parent of the current step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: parentTransitionID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Id of the transition which has brought the instance to the processed step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: parentTransitionName
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Name of the transition which has brought the instance to the processed step.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: inTest
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Whether this journey is in test mode or not.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: processingTime
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Total time in milliseconds from the instance step entrance to the end of the processing.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: instanceType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: indicate the instance type, if it is batch or unitary.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: recurrenceIndex
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Index of the recurrence if the journey is batch and recurring (first run has recurrenceIndex = 1).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchToUnitary
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: Indicates if this unitary instance has been triggered from a batch instance.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchExternalKey
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: External Key for batch event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchInstanceID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: this is the batch instance ID.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: batchUnitaryBranchID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: If the instance has been triggered from a batch instance, unitary branch ID.
